properties.entry: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_ODR ( ORDER_NO , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , USER_NO , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_ENROLL , GIFT_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ODR_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , 'N' )

SELECT O.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , ORDER_NO , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_ENROLL , GIFT_YN , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , EMAIL , PHONE , USER_NAME FROM PRODUCT_ODR JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC)O WHERE ROWNUM=1
INSERT INTO KAKAO_PAYMENT ( PAY_NO_K , ORDER_NO_K , PAY_DATE_K , PAY_COMPANY_K , PAY_PRICE_K , PAY_IMP_UID , PAY_MERCHANT_UID ) VALUES ( SEQ_KAKAOPAY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , DEFAULT , ? , ? , ? , ? )

UPDATE MEMBER SET BALANCE = BALANCE + (SELECT PAY_PRICE_K FROM (SELECT PAY_PRICE_K , PAY_NO_K FROM PRODUCT_ODR JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN KAKAO_PAYMENT ON (ORDER_NO_K = ORDER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PAY_NO_K DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) WHERE USER_NO = ?
